>>38207075

You consume your exploring gear, setting up ropes that you can use to climb down and back up the cliff face. You're not really sure how, but the game seems to help you with getting them in place, and they seem pretty sturdy. You were also never much of a climber, but seeing as you can jump close to your own height in this game, it makes sense that it's also easier to climb.

“Get Eunoia ready. I saw something move down there, and I'd hate for us to get jumped.” You say, mounting the ropes.

“That beam attack uses about half the duration.” Aelriss says. “I'll be ready, but Eunoia's more of a support. Blow it all at once and I'm down to my staff for quite a while.”

“Can you use it to scout ahead?” You ask.

“I can't see through it.” She responds. “That sounds like a hell of an upgrade, though...”

> Equip the buckler.
> Go two-handed.
